Package ohos.media.recorder

Class Recorder.RecorderOnErrorType

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.recorder.Recorder.RecorderOnErrorType
  • Enclosing class:
    Recorder

    public static final class Recorder.RecorderOnErrorType
extends Object
    Describes recording framework errors. The recording must stop if a framework error occurs.
    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MEDIA_ERROR_NOT_VALID_FOR_PROGRESSIVE_PLAYBACK
      Indicates that an error occurs during recording.
      static int MEDIA_ERROR_SERVER_DIED
      Indicates that the service stops abnormally.
      static int MEDIA_RECORDER_ERROR_UNKNOWN
      Indicates an unknown recording error.
